author: Rotten Tomatoes Trailers
description:
The cast of the new I Know What You Did Last Summer sat down with RT correspondent Natasha Martinez for an exclusive interview to talk rewatching the original, working alongside horror legends Jennifer Love Hewitt and Freddie Prinze Jr., how to nail the perfect scream, hint at hidden Easter eggs, and reflect on how horror has evolved since the ’90s.

► Buy Tickets for I Know What You Did Last Summer (2025): https://www.fandango.com/i-know-what-you-did-last-summer-2025-240096/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
► Learn more: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/i_know_what_you_did_last_summer_2025?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
 
Subscribe to the channel and click the bell icon to be notified of all the hottest trailers: http://bit.ly/2CNniBy  

► Shop Rotten Tomatoes: http://bit.ly/3KvCU1M

title: The ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Cast on the Evolution of Horror Movies
